alert.note: Alert for Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Osborne County through 745 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Luray, or 15 miles north of Russell, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Osborne County, north and northwest of Luray. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
